scripts.gen: tsup scripts/gen.ts --out-dir scripts --format esm && node scripts/gen.js
scripts.build: wasm-pack build . --release --out-dir=.build --out-name index -- -Z build-std=core,std,alloc,panic_abort -Z build-std-features=panic_immediate_abort && tsup index.ts --out-dir dist --loader ".wasm=file" --format esm
